findings.title: Missing events to track down the transfer of ownership to the newOwner
findings.description: The contract does not emit an event when transferring ownership to a new owner.

findings.title: Missing Zero Address Validation
findings.description: The function does not validate if the address is zero before performing operations.

findings.title: Missing Zero Address Check for to address
findings.description: The transfer function lacks a check to ensure the 'to' address is not zero.

findings.title: Missing Zero Address Check for spender address
findings.description: The approve function does not validate if the spender address is zero.

findings.title: Missing Zero Token Transfer Validation
findings.description: The transferFrom() function lacks validation to prevent zero token transfers.

findings.title: Reentrancy Issue
findings.description: External call to spender address can result in reentrancy if the spender is a contract, it can issue a reentrant call to any of this contract's function from its fallback function.

findings.title: Unused Event LogInt()
findings.description: The approve function contains an unused event LogInt().

findings.title: approve() race
findings.description: A widely-known racing condition in the approve function allows a spender to witness the token owner broadcast a transaction altering their approval and quickly sign and broadcast a transaction using transferFrom to move the current approved amount from the owner's balance to the spender.
